title: MIT-Pillar AI Collective announces first seed grant recipients
summary: The MIT-Pillar AI Collective has announced its first six grant recipients, who will receive funding and support for research projects in artificial intelligence, machine learning, and data science. The grants aim to help students explore commercial applications for their research and drive the creation of startups. The recipients are working on projects ranging from predictive query interfaces to light-activated drugs and low-cost 3D perception. The program also provides mentorship, guidance, and community events to support the recipients in their entrepreneurial journey.
